entry.title: WIND WARNING , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 07:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: E 17 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 90. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
